title: "process_spatial03 - removing cleanups within 500m buffer"

date: "2023-07-06"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

# read in packages
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(janitor)
```

# read in processed spatial data
```{r}
spdata_main <- read_csv(here("data", "processed", "spatialdata_01_main.csv"))
```

# data wrangling

Remove cleanups after 1st within 500m buffer

```{r}
spdata_500mbuffer <- spdata_main %>% 
  filter()
```



# save dataframe as spatialdata_03_2020_500m.csv
```{r}
write_csv(spdata_500mbuffer, here("data", "processed", "spatialdata_03_2020_500m.csv"))
```
